sentences.sContent: ...an eighteenth century ballad about some lost children called the Babes in the Wood.
sentences.sCn: …一首关于迷路儿童的名为《丛林中的宝贝》的18世纪民间叙事诗。

sentences.sContent: "You Don't Know Paris" is one of the most beautiful ballads that he ever wrote.
sentences.sCn: 《你不了解巴黎》是他写过的最优美的流行情歌之一。

synos.tran: 歌谣，民谣；叙事歌谣；流行抒情歌曲
